name: Ambedo - A Game of Pleasant Detours
name_original: Ambedo - A Game of Pleasant Detours
description:
Ambedo is a game about pleasant detours, having a destination but maybe allowing yourself to get distracted along the way. It is a short project as part of my course work in the "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D: Learn to Code Making Games" course on Udemy. I hope you like it. 

Design, programming, writing, guitar, and recording by me, Jacob Vander Ende. 

Credit for the origin and definition of ambedo goes to the Dictionary of Obscure Sorrows, a now-defunct website of beautiful words.
